data.title: DragChamp Jr. Racer Top 10 List
data.meta_description: Mia Rybarski makes three final rounds in one weekend to lead the DragChamp Jr. Racer Top 10 List presented by Laris Motorsports Insurance.
data.text:
Mia Rybarski makes three final rounds in one weekend to lead the DragChamp Jr. Racer Top 10 List presented by Laris Motorsports Insurance.

08/07/24 – Welcome to the DragChamp Jr. Racer Top 10 List presented by Laris Motorsports Insurance. Each week we rank the best Jr. racers across the country based on their weekly performances. Nominations are accepted every Monday evening on our Facebook page.

Racecar insurance is more affordable than you think! Laris Motorsports Insurance policies are handled in house so they can provide quotes within minutes and they offer the broadest coverage available. Call (985) 746-4663 today to learn how Laris Motorsports Insurance can protect your racing operation both on and off the track! If you’re a business owner, Laris also offers commercial insurance. Protect your business with a trusted name.

Click here to view previous Top 10 Lists.

DragChamp Jr. Racer Top 10 List

1 – Mia Rybarski

Mia Rybarski takes the #1 spot on this week’s Top 10 list after making three finals at the Midwest Jr. Super Series Back to School Nationals. On Saturday, she won her age group class and earned the Outlaw 330 runner-up. She also made it down to 7 cars in Sportsman. Then on Sunday, she won the 7.90 Index and achieved two perfect .000 lights.

2 – Tinley Gortney

Tinley Gortney claims the #2 spot after also making three final rounds at the Midwest Jr Super Series Back to School Nationals. She earned runner-up finishes in Quick 16 and 7.90 Index, and won the $2,500-to-win Sportsman class.

3 – Cole Rudy

Cole Rudy had a clean sweep this past weekend, doubling up in the SBRA Series Jr. Dragster class. The weekend prior, he won the NHRA Summit Series Jr. Dragster open class, making it a total of three wins in two weeks at Mason Dixon Dragway.

4 – Camron Nelson

DragChamp Pro Member Camron Nelson captured the fourth spot on this week’s Top 10 list after winning the 15-17 year-old class at the Ardmore Dragway NHRA Division 4 JDRL ET Finals. The weekend prior, Camron earned a NHRA Jr. Wally win, a Sportsman win, and a runner-up finish.

5 – Dawson “D-Pain” Rogers

DragChamp Pro Member Dawson “D-Pain” Rogers returns to the Top 10 list after winning the 10-12 year-old class at the NHRA Division 4 JDRL ET Finals. This victory comes just weeks after his successful performance at the NHRA Eastern Conference Finals. So far this season, he has made 16 finals and secured 11 wins. This win also makes him a 3-time Division 4 champion!

6 – Ryan Harris

Ryan Harris earned a spot on this week’s Top 10 list after winning the last three PDRA Pro Jr. Dragster races. His most recent win came this past weekend at the PDRA Northern Nationals.

7 – Carson Wied

Carson Wied holds the #7 spot after winning the 8.90 Index class, securing the runner-up in the 10-12 age group, and earning the runner-up in the golf cart race at the MJSS Back to School Nationals.

8 – Kynlee Darr

Kynlee Darr claimed the #8 spot after a successful weekend at the MJSS Back to School Nationals. She earned the 6-9 Sportsman runner-up, made it to the semi-finals of Quick 16, and won the 13.90 Index class.

9 (Tie) – Lane Swift

This past weekend, Lane Swift claimed a runner-up finish in the Ardmore Dragway Fun Race on Saturday and followed it up by winning the 6-9 NHRA D4 Divisional Championship on Sunday.

9 (Tie) – Ryan Alexander

Ryan Alexander nearly doubled up this past weekend at the Gulfport Dragway WDRA Points Series. He won Friday Night’s Showdown Shootout and earned the runner-up spot in Saturday’s 13-17 year-old age group.

10 (Tie) – Abigail Wilson

Abigail Wilson has been on a roll, claiming two Wallys in two weeks. This past weekend, she won the JDRL Division 4 Race of Champions at Ardmore Dragway, and the weekend prior, she took home a Jr. Street Wally.

10 (Tie) – Blake LeCates Truitt

Blake LeCates Truitt rounds out this week’s Top 10 list after winning back-to-back weekends. This past weekend he won on Sunday at the US 13 Dragway Hillbilly Bracket Bash.

Let us what you think about the DragChamp Jr. Top 10 List. We want to hear from you. Check us out on Facebook and share it with your friends.

And remember, look for our DragChamp Jr. Top 10 List nominations Facebook post every Monday evening. You can nominate your favorites in the comments of the post for consideration on the list.

If you nominate a racer, please include their name, their accomplishment, which track(s), and a winners circle photo. Some racers have missed the list because we didn’t have enough information and couldn’t find anything online.

DragChamp is your online source for sportsman drag race results, news, and updates.
